issue.message: The current server URL uses a variable for the API version number, but the user explicitly requested to set the API endpoint to '/api/v1'.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the URL of the first server entry to hardcode 'v1' for the API version, changing it from 'https://{{your-n8n-instance-domain}}/api/v{{api-version-number}}' to 'https://{{your-n8n-instance-domain}}/api/v1'. The 'api-version-number' variable remains defined but is no longer referenced in the URL.
